ðŸ“– Summary: EdgeBox is a local LLM agent sandbox that provides a fully-featured GUI and CLI environment for developing and executing AI agents. It's based on the E2B open-source project and offers complete MCP protocol support, enabling agents to interact with browsers, terminals, and desktop applications locally.
